mille-feuille

mille-feuille acts as an orchestrator when running sampling, learning and optimisation loops against expensive MPI-parallelised HPC codes. For optimisation, it is a thin wrapper on top of BoTorch, providing the necessary interface between simulators, surrogates and optimisers.
